title: Lovely 1 Bedroom apartment! Beautiful garden-like setting!
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - Stratford Arms!', 'Address:', '417 Valley Hill Rd SW', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'Beds:', '1 - 2  /', 'Baths:', '1 - 1.5 /', 'Size:', '800 - 1150 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', 'Please call', 'This exceptional location provides easy access to a variety of restaurants, shops and banks, as well as major interstates!', 'Security Deposit:', 'Call', 'Length of Lease:', '12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Property Features:', '● 24 Hour Availability', '● 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service on Site', '● Convenient Online Rental Payments', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Planned Social Activities', '● Resident Referral Program', '● Sparkling Swimming Pool', '● Sundeck', '● Well Equipped Playground', '● Convenient to Hospital & Medical Facilities', '● Easy Access to Airport & Interstate Highways', '● Free Monthly Pest Control', '● Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '● Minutes from Southlake Mall & Shopping', '● Riverdale Main Library Is Across The Street!', '● Tennis Court', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '● Dishwasher', '● Frost-Free Refrigerator', '● Private Balcony/Patio', '● Tub/Shower', '● Wall to Wall Carpeting', '● Washer/Dryer Connections in Townhomes', 'Pets:', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $10.00 Comments:', 'A Pet Agreement is required for all resident pet owners.', 'Allowable pets are dogs, cats, birds and fish.', 'Breed restrictions apply and must be approved by management.', 'Restricted breeds are as follows: Pitbulls/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweilers, Doberman, German Shepherd, Chow, Reptiles, and Pot Bellied Pigs', 'Business Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Ready to Lease?', 'Call our office at', 'show contact info', 'Proudly managed by Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
